title: Chocolate Duo Ice Cream
ingredients: ['500ml chocolate ice cream', '500ml ginger ice cream', '500ml lemon sorbet', '500ml mango sorbet', '500ml raspberry sorbet', '500ml vanilla ice cream', '6 shortbread biscuits', 'assorted fruit (raspberries, lemon slices, mango, etc.)', 'chocolate shavings', 'melted chocolate (optional)']
